description: A research workflow optimized for speed: build a plan, extract authorities, and produce a cite-checkable draft.
checklist: Clarify question presented, jurisdiction, and standard of review
Build an issue tree and a search plan (queries + sources)
Extract holdings and key quotes (with citations)
Draft outline, then draft sections, then run cite-check
risk_notes: Do not trust citations from AI without verifying the underlying source.
Separate factual assumptions from legal conclusions in your draft.
